holidays.title: National Proposal Day
holidays.description: Whether you’re planning a giant flashmob or a romantic dinner, it's the day we celebrate proposals in all their forms.

holidays.title: National Ravioli Day
holidays.description: Triple cheese. Wild mushroom. Butternut squash. Ravioli can handle just about anything.

holidays.title: Absolutely Incredible Kid Day®
holidays.description: Kids are the future. And Camp Fire stands ready to help.

holidays.title: Alien Abduction Day
holidays.description: Do you believe in aliens? Maybe you will when you are done reading this!

holidays.title: Astrology Day
holidays.description: Astrology teaches us about how the alignment of the stars forms our personalities.

holidays.title: Bibliomania Day
holidays.description: If you have a soft spot for books, come explore bibliomania with us on this day.

holidays.title: Bock Beer Day
holidays.description: For those about to bock, spare a few minutes and read all about bock beer!

holidays.title: Companies That Care Day
holidays.description: A lesson all employers must learn is that a happy employee is a loyal employee.

holidays.title: Dogs in Yellow Day
holidays.description: All that #dogsinyellow need is some space and then the world feels less terrifying.

holidays.title: Feast of Saint Joseph
holidays.description: Saint Joseph’s sheer empathy for his fellow man is admired and celebrated for all to see.

holidays.title: Francophonie Day
holidays.description: Take a moment and open your mind to see the beautiful celebration of the historic French language.

holidays.title: French Language Day
holidays.description: Celebrate with some French culture, language, and history as we ask..."Parlez vous Francais?"

holidays.title: Great American Meat Out Day
holidays.description: Join us as we delve into the risks associated with relying on farm animals for food!

holidays.title: Hufflepuff Pride Day
holidays.description: Prepare to proudly wear your gold and black Hufflepuff scarf today! Let’s celebrate.

holidays.title: Kiss Your Fiance Day
holidays.description: Get ready to shower your beloved with kisses this National Kiss Your Fiance Day!

holidays.title: March Equinox
holidays.description: Stop and smell the roses as we celebrate the change of seasons.

holidays.title: National Close the Gap Day
holidays.description: The campaign encourages planning of events that focus on health issues of Australia’s indigenous people.

holidays.title: National Farm Rescuer Day
holidays.description: Farm rescuers help farmers by volunteering their time, talents, and financial resources.

holidays.title: National Jump Out Day
holidays.description: Jumping activities with friends can lighten up the mood and strengthen friendships.

holidays.title: National Macaron Day
holidays.description: It’s Macaron Day and we’re talking all things tasty, so prepare to have your tastebuds wowed!

holidays.title: National Native HIV/AIDS Awareness Day
holidays.description: Put on your boxing gloves for the fight against H.I.V./AIDS.

holidays.title: Oranges And Lemons Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate Oranges and Lemons Day by feasting on these citrus fruits.

holidays.title: Spring Begins
holidays.description: The fading of winter brings with it new beginnings: Spring Begins!

holidays.title: Spring Equinox
holidays.description: The equinox is when the sun sits vertically above the equator, making day and night equal across the planet.

holidays.title: Won't You Be My Neighbor Day
holidays.description: Go on and do something neighborly on this Won’t You Be My Neighbor Day.

holidays.title: World Behavior Analysis Day
holidays.description: Let's get ready to reflect on our behavior in order to become better individuals!

holidays.title: World Day of Theatre for Children and Young People
holidays.description: It's The World Day of Theatre for Children and Young People, take to the stage!

holidays.title: World Flour Day
holidays.description: Learn more about the staple element that benefits everyone around the world.

holidays.title: World Frog Day
holidays.description: Out of the 6,000 known species of frogs found, 4,800 species have been recorded.

holidays.title: World Oral Health Day
holidays.description: Prevention is better than cure — grab your brush as we swipe plaque off of the facts.

holidays.title: World Sparrow Day
holidays.description: It’s World Sparrow Day! Join in and celebrate these little creatures with us!

holidays.title: World Storytelling Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate storytelling, an art form that is older than time itself.

holidays.title: National Cherry Blossom Festival
holidays.description: Springtime sets in and cherry blossoms are in full bloom; we delight in their beauty.

holidays.title: Naw-Ruz (Baha'i New Year)
holidays.description: Naw-Rúz is the day of spiritual spring. Celebrate with us today!

holidays.title: Snowman Burning Day
holidays.description: Out with the cold, in with the warm. Let’s get ready for Snowman Burning Day!

holidays.title: Fred Rogers’s Birthday
holidays.description: The children’s show host was among the most-loved television personalities in the U.S.
